3116.verse: وَٱتَّقُواْ|And fear|78|94|467$ٱلَّذِى|the One Who|107|139|138$خَلَقَكُمْ|created you|100|132|191$وَٱلْجِبِلَّةَ|and the generations|153|185|13047$ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ|the former."|99|115|5507$

3121.verse: فَكَذَّبُوهُ|But they denied him,|157|167|6500$فَأَخَذَهُمْ|so seized them|119|140|13050$عَذَابُ|(the) punishment|134|154|5574$يَوْمِ|(of the) day|101|122|10$ٱلظُّلَّةِ‌ۚ|(of) the shadow.|132|142|13051$إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed, it|84|112|396$كَانَ|was|57|114|913$عَذَابَ|(the) punishment|134|191|1786$يَوْمٍ|(of) a Day|88|145|2331$عَظِيمٍ|Great.|75|103|3522$

3123.verse: وَإِنَّ|And indeed,|98|112|713$رَبَّكَ|your Lord|82|110|586$لَهُوَ|surely, He|86|114|2957$ٱلْعَزِيزُ|(is) the All-Mighty,|145|174|1187$ٱلرَّحِيمُ|the Most Merciful.|140|154|398$

3124.verse: وَإِنَّهُۥ|And indeed, it|112|138|1195$لَتَنزِيلُ|surely, is a Revelation|165|218|13052$رَبِّ|(of the) Lord|105|158|7$ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ|(of) the worlds.|124|150|8$

3125.verse: نَزَلَ بِهِ|Has brought it down,|159|229|13053$ٱلرُّوحُ|the Spirit|82|222|10520$ٱلْأَمِينُ|[the] Trustworthy,|145|215|13054$

3128.verse: وَإِنَّهُۥ|And indeed, it|112|135|1195$لَفِى|surely, (is) in|107|152|1513$زُبُرِ|(the) Scriptures|126|171|13058$ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ|(of) the former (people).|184|207|5507$

3131.verse: فَقَرَأَهُۥ|And he (had) recited it|172|183|13064$عَلَيْهِم|to them,|77|100|22$مَّا|not|42|65|262$كَانُواْ|they would|93|116|94$بِهِۦ|in it|52|75|204$مُؤْمِنِينَ|(be) believers.|116|127|879$

3132.verse: كَذَٲلِكَ|Thus|77|96|702$سَلَكْنَـٰهُ|We have inserted it|150|188|13065$فِى|into|48|86|89$قُلُوبِ|(the) hearts|101|139|3365$ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ|(of) the criminals.|138|157|5641$

3133.verse: لَا|Not|43|49|30$يُؤْمِنُونَ|they will believe|126|138|35$بِهِۦ|in it|52|64|204$حَتَّىٰ|until|64|76|526$يَرَوُاْ|they see|78|90|8289$ٱلْعَذَابَ|the punishment|122|134|1442$ٱلْأَلِيمَ|[the] painful.|107|113|8290$

3134.verse: فَيَأْتِيَهُم|And it will come to them|181|198|13066$بَغْتَةً|suddenly,|83|116|5526$وَهُمْ|while they|88|121|256$لَا|(do) not|75|108|30$يَشْعُرُونَ|perceive.|105|122|88$

3136.verse: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا|So is it for Our punishment|197|351|13069$يَسْتَعْجِلُونَ|they wish to hasten?|160|314|13070$

3137.verse: أَفَرَءَيْتَ|Then have you seen|155|194|11287$إِن|if|44|122|225$مَّتَّعْنَـٰهُمْ|We let them enjoy|142|220|13071$سِنِينَ|(for) years|91|130|9020$

3116.verse: And fear He who created you and the former creation."

3117.verse: They said, "You are only of those affected by magic.

3118.verse: You are but a man like ourselves, and indeed, we think you are among the liars.

3119.verse: So cause to fall upon us fragments of the sky, if you should be of the truthful."

3120.verse: He said, "My Lord is most knowing of what you do."

3121.verse: And they denied him, so the punishment of the day of the black cloud seized them. Indeed, it was the punishment of a terrible day.

3122.verse: Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.

3123.verse: And indeed, your Lord - He is the Exalted in Might, the Merciful.

3124.verse: And indeed, the Qur'an is the revelation of the Lord of the worlds.

3125.verse: The Trustworthy Spirit has brought it down

3126.verse: Upon your heart, [O Muhammad] - that you may be of the warners -

3128.verse: And indeed, it is [mentioned] in the scriptures of former peoples.

3129.verse: And has it not been a sign to them that it is recognized by the scholars of the Children of Israel?

3130.verse: And even if We had revealed it to one among the foreigners

3131.verse: And he had recited it to them [perfectly], they would [still] not have been believers in it.

3132.verse: Thus have We inserted disbelief into the hearts of the criminals.

3133.verse: They will not believe in it until they see the painful punishment.

3134.verse: And it will come to them suddenly while they perceive [it] not.

3135.verse: And they will say, "May we be reprieved?"

3136.verse: So for Our punishment are they impatient?

3137.verse: Then have you considered if We gave them enjoyment for years

3138.verse: And then there came to them that which they were promised?
